title: Angels and Demons deserves the classic 'Two Thumbs up' and its unfair that has a rate below of 8.
review: Angels and demons is one of the greatest mystery movie I've ever seen in my life, it has a great suspense, great action, and of course disturbing deaths that will freak out anybody. I am writing this comment because is a crime to put this movie a rate below of 8. Ron Howard, Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor, are a excellent working group. I didn't grade with a 10 angels and demons for a simple reason; the performance of Nikolaj Lie Kaas,The assassin, is very average for a movie as this. But anyway this is a very enjoyable Movie. Maybe critics didn't liked this movie, but as the Pink Panther 2 (even are very different genres), this is a movie for public, not for critics. If you watch the really grade of angels and Demons is 7.2, which is quite different from 6.9, the actual grade. Angels and Demons is more than just actors. The set its incredible, all the churches and the places that Robert Langdon and Vittoria Vettra went were just outstanding. My congrats to the people of special effects in this movie, its very disturbing the suicide of the carmelengo and the deaths of three of four cardinals are very scary. Finally to the people who are going to watch this movie: ENJOY IT!

title: 7!? it deserves a 2!
review: this movie is awful, its better Madagascar 1 far, very far, 7 is a lot for a comedy with 3 or 4 jokes, if the penguins weren't there this movie deserves Razzies, the Christmas special from the penguin its lots better than this.This movie Tries to be a fable, father gone, mother gone and the little Alex go to the zoo. Imagine all comic possibilities with this story, but the writer seems to be blind, he didn't saw that Madagascar 2 was to follow to a masterpiece, not a bad spoof.Really, IMDb users, reflect do you really think Madagascar 2 Africa deserves a 7, 5 its a lot for this movie, thats why I put it a 2.I hope dream works make a third, for make us forget this crap.
